text: @realDonaldTrump Our Stupid Moron in the White House is on the Suicidal Path. IF the Country is "OPEN" now, the @Covid19 will skyrocket and the hospitals will be overwhelmed. US has no PPEs, Reagents for various TESTS and we will be in a hellish state. Then we will be forced to shut down AGAIN!😬
